title: WTT: My T213-1 for your T206 Cobb
author: lug-nut

posts.post_title: WTT: My T213-1 for your T206 Cobb
posts.post_content:
Willing to put my PSA 2 T213-1 Mild Coupon toward a trade of one of the following backs of Cobb in grade SGC/PSA 2-3:

Tolstoi    Bat off
EPDG      Bat off
Sovereign   Green, Bat on, Bat off

Send scans to [url]madolfi1968@yahoo.com[/url]
